title: Dual-track systems, electrodeless sources and more
Synthesis of a single cycle of light with compact erbium-doped fibre technology
title_cn: 紧凑型掺fiber光纤技术合成单光循环
abstract: The advent of self-referenced optical frequency combs has sparked the development of novel areas in ultrafast sciences such as attosecond technology and the synthesis of arbitrary optical waveforms. Few-cycle light pulses are key to these time-domain applications, driving a quest for reliable, stable and cost-efficient mode-locked laser sources with ultrahigh spectral bandwidth. Here, we present a set-up based entirely on compact erbium-doped fibre technology, which produces single cycles of light. The pulse duration of 4.3 fs is close to the shortest possible value for a data bit of information transmitted in the near-infrared regime. These results demonstrate that fundamental limits for optical telecommunications are accessible with existing fibre technology and standard free-space components.
abstract_cn: 自参考光学频率梳的出现激发了超快速科学领域的新领域的发展，例如阿秒技术和任意光波形的合成。 很少有周期的光脉冲是这些时域应用的关键，从而促使人们寻求具有超高光谱带宽的可靠，稳定且经济高效的锁模激光源。 在这里，我们介绍一种完全基于紧凑型掺fiber光纤技术的设置，该技术可以产生单个光周期。 4.3＆fsfs的脉冲持续时间接近以近红外方式传输的信息数据位的最短可能值。 这些结果表明，使用现有的光纤技术和标准的自由空间组件可以达到对光通信的基本限制。

title: CMOS-compatible multiple-wavelength oscillator for on-chip optical interconnects
title_cn: CMOS兼容多波长振荡器，用于片上光学互连
abstract: Silicon photonics enables the fabrication of on-chip, ultrahigh-bandwidth optical networks that are critical for the future of microelectronics. Several optical components necessary for implementing a wavelength division multiplexing network have been demonstrated in silicon. However, a fully integrated multiple-wavelength source capable of driving such a network has not yet been realized. Optical amplification, a necessary component for lasing, has been achieved on-chip through stimulated Raman scattering, parametric mixing and by silicon nanocrystals or nanopatterned silicon. Losses in most of these structures have prevented oscillation. Raman oscillators have been demonstrated, but with a narrow gain bandwidth that is insufficient for wavelength division multiplexing. Here, we demonstrate the first monolithically integrated CMOS-compatible source by creating an optical parametric oscillator formed by a silicon nitride ring resonator on silicon. The device can generate more than 100 new wavelengths with operating powers below 50 mW. This source can form the backbone of a high-bandwidth optical network on a microelectronic chip.
abstract_cn: 硅光子学使得能够制造对微电子的未来至关重要的片上超高带宽光网络。在硅中已经展示了实现波分复用网络所需的几种光学组件。但是，尚未实现能够驱动这样的网络的完全集成的多波长源。通过激发拉曼散射，参量混合以及硅纳米晶体或纳米图案化硅，已在芯片上实现了光放大（激光发射的必要成分）。这些结构中的大多数损耗已阻止了振荡。拉曼振荡器已经被证明，但是增益带宽很窄，不足以进行波分复用。在这里，我们通过在硅上创建由氮化硅环形谐振器形成的光学参量振荡器，来演示第一个单片集成CMOS兼容源。该设备可以产生100多个新波长，工作功率低于50＆＃160mW。该源可以构成微电子芯片上高带宽光网络的骨干。

title: CMOS-compatible integrated optical hyper-parametric oscillator
title_cn: CMOS兼容的集成光学超参数振荡器
abstract: Integrated multiple-wavelength laser sources, critical for important applications such as high-precision broadband sensing and spectroscopy, molecular fingerprinting, optical clocks and attosecond physics, have recently been demonstrated in silica and single-crystal microtoroid resonators using parametric gain. However, for applications in telecommunications and optical interconnects, analogous devices compatible with a fully integrated platform do not yet exist. Here, we report a fully integrated, CMOS-compatible, multiple-wavelength source. We achieve optical ‘hyper-parametric’ oscillation in a high-index silica-glass microring resonator with a differential slope efficiency above threshold of 7.4% for a single oscillating mode, a continuous-wave threshold power as low as 54 mW, and a controllable range of frequency spacing from 200 GHz to more than 6 THz. The low loss, design flexibility and CMOS compatibility of this device will enable the creation of multiple-wavelength sources for telecommunications, computing, sensing, metrology and other areas.
abstract_cn: 集成多波长激光源对于诸如高精度宽带传感和光谱学，分子指纹，光学时钟和阿秒物理学等重要应用至关重要，最近在使用参数增益的二氧化硅和单晶微环形谐振器中得到了证明。但是，对于电信和光学互连中的应用，尚不存在与完全集成平台兼容的类似设备。在这里，我们报告了一个完全集成的，兼容CMOS的多波长光源。我们实现了光学＆＃8216;超参数＆＃8217;高折射率石英玻璃微环谐振器的振荡，对于单个振荡模式，其斜率差分效率高于阈值7.4％，连续波阈值功率低至54＆＃160mW，并且频率间隔可控制在200＆＃160; GHz至超过6＆＃160; THz。该器件的低损耗，设计灵活性和CMOS兼容性将使能够为电信，计算，传感，计量学和其他领域创建多波长光源。

title: On-chip single nanoparticle detection and sizing by mode splitting in an ultrahigh-Q microresonator
title_cn: 通过超高Q微谐振器中的模式分裂对芯片上的单个纳米颗粒进行检测和调整尺寸
abstract: The ability to detect and size individual nanoparticles with high resolution is crucial to understanding the behaviour of single particles and effectively using their strong size-dependent properties to develop innovative products. We report real-time, in situ detection and sizing of single nanoparticles, down to 30 nm in radius, using mode splitting in a monolithic ultrahigh-quality-factor (Q) whispering-gallery-mode microresonator. Particle binding splits a whispering-gallery mode into two spectrally shifted resonance modes, forming a self-referenced detection scheme. This technique provides superior noise suppression and enables the extraction of accurate particle size information with a single-shot measurement in a microscale device. Our method requires neither labelling of the particles nor a priori information on their presence in the medium, providing an effective platform to study nanoparticles at single-particle resolution.
abstract_cn: 以高分辨率检测和确定单个纳米粒子的能力对于理解单个粒子的行为以及有效利用其强大的尺寸依赖性特性开发创新产品至关重要。 我们报告了在单片超高质量因子（Q）耳语画廊模式微谐振器中使用模式拆分对半径小于30 nm的单个纳米粒子进行实时，原位检测和定尺寸的问题。 粒子绑定将耳语画廊模式分为两个频谱偏移的共振模式，从而形成了自参考检测方案。 该技术可提供出色的噪声抑制能力，并能够通过在微型设备中进行单次测量来提取准确的粒度信息。 我们的方法既不需要标记颗粒，也不需要有关它们在介质中的存在的先验信息，从而为研究单颗粒分辨率的纳米颗粒提供了有效的平台。

title: Generation of molecular hot electroluminescence by resonant nanocavity plasmons
title_cn: 共振纳米腔等离子体激元产生分子热电致发光
abstract: Control of the radiative properties of functional molecules near metals is a key issue in nano-optics, and is particularly important in the fields of energy transfer and light manipulation at the nanoscale and the development of plasmonic devices. Despite the various vibronic transitions (S1(v′) → S0(v)) available for frequency tuning of fluorescence, the molecular emissions near metals reported to date have been subject to Kasha's rule, with radiative decay from the lowest excited state (S1(0)) (refs –). Here, we show resonant hot electroluminescence arising directly from higher vibronic levels of the singlet excited state (S1(v′ > 0)) for porphyrin molecules confined inside a nanocavity in a scanning tunnelling microscope, by spectrally tuning the frequency of plasmons. We also demonstrate the generation of unexpected upconversion electroluminescence. These observations suggest that the local nanocavity plasmons behave like a strong coherent optical source with tunable energy, and can be used to actively control the radiative channels of molecular emitters by means of intense resonance enhancement of both excitation and emission.
abstract_cn: 控制金属附近功能分子的辐射特性是纳米光学中的关键问题，在纳米级的能量转移和光处理以及等离激元器件的开发领域中尤其重要。尽管存在各种可用于频率调谐的振动过渡（S 1 （v＆＃8242;）＆＃160;＆＃8594;＆＃160; S 0 （v））在荧光方面，迄今为止报道的金属附近的分子发射受Kasha法则的约束，具有从最低激发态（S 1 （0））的辐射衰减（refs＆＃160;＆＃8211;） 。在此，我们显示了受约束的卟啉分子的单峰激发态（S 1 （v＆＃8242;＆＃160;＆gt;＃160; 0））的较高电子振动水平直接引起的共振热电致发光通过在光谱上调谐等离激元的频率，在扫描隧道显微镜中观察纳米腔内部。我们还证明了意外的上转换电致发光的产生。这些观察结果表明，局部纳米腔等离激元的行为类似于具有可调谐能量的强相干光源，并且可以通过强烈激发和发射的共振增强而用于主动控制分子发射器的辐射通道。

title: Cavity-enhanced dual-comb spectroscopy
abstract: The sensitivity of molecular fingerprinting is dramatically improved when the absorbing sample is placed in a high-finesse optical cavity, because the effective path length is increased. When the equidistant lines from a laser frequency comb are simultaneously injected into the cavity over a large spectral range, multiple trace gases may be identified within a few milliseconds. However, efficient analysis of the light transmitted through the cavity remains challenging. Here, a novel approach—cavity-enhanced, frequency-comb, Fourier-transform spectroscopy—fully overcomes this difficulty and enables measurement of ultrasensitive, broad-bandwidth, high-resolution spectra within a few tens of microseconds without any need for detector arrays, potentially from the terahertz to ultraviolet regions. Within a period of just 18 µs, we recorded the spectra of the ammonia 1.0 µm overtone bands comprising 1,500 spectral elements and spanning 20 nm, with a resolution of 4.5 GHz and a noise equivalent absorption at 1 s averaging of 1 × 10−10 cm−1 Hz−1/2, thus opening a route to time-resolved spectroscopy of rapidly evolving single events.
abstract_cn: 当吸收样品放置在高精细光学腔中时，分子指纹的灵敏度会大大提高，因为有效路径长度会增加。当将来自激光频率梳的等距线同时在较大的光谱范围内注入腔体时，可以在几毫秒内识别出多种痕量气体。但是，有效分析通过腔体传输的光仍然具有挑战性。在这里，一种新颖的方法，腔增强，频率梳，傅立叶变换光谱法可以完全克服这一难题，并可以在几十微秒内测量超灵敏，宽带，高分辨率的光谱用于探测器阵列，可能从太赫兹到紫外线区域。在短短的18 s内，我们记录了包含1,500个光谱元素且跨度20 nm的氨1.0＆m泛音谱带的光谱，分辨率为4.5＆＃160; GHz和平均1＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 ＆＃8722; 10 ＆＃160; cm < sup>＆＃8722; 1 ＆＃160; Hz ＆＃8722; 1/2 ，从而为快速发展的单个事件的时间分辨光谱学开辟了道路。

title: An optical ultrafast random bit generator
title_cn: 光学超快随机位发生器
abstract: The generation of random bit sequences based on non-deterministic physical mechanisms is of paramount importance for cryptography and secure communications. High data rates also require extremely fast generation rates and robustness to external perturbations. Physical generators based on stochastic noise sources have been limited in bandwidth to ∼100 Mbit s−1 generation rates. We present a physical random bit generator, based on a chaotic semiconductor laser, having time-delayed self-feedback, which operates reliably at rates up to 300 Gbit s−1. The method uses a high derivative of the digitized chaotic laser intensity and generates the random sequence by retaining a number of the least significant bits of the high derivative value. The method is insensitive to laser operational parameters and eliminates the necessity for all external constraints such as incommensurate sampling rates and laser external cavity round trip time. The randomness of long bit strings is verified by standard statistical tests.
abstract_cn: 基于非确定性物理机制的随机位序列的生成对于密码学和安全通信至关重要。高数据速率还要求极高的生成速率和对外部干扰的鲁棒性。基于随机噪声源的物理生成器的带宽已被限制为＆＃8764; 100 Mbit s ＆＃8722; 1 生成速率。我们提出了一种基于混沌半导体激光器的物理随机位发生器，该发生器具有延时的自反馈功能，其可靠运行的速率高达300＆＃160; Gbit＆＃160; s ＆＃8722; 1 。该方法使用数字化混沌激光强度的高导数，并通过保留高导数值的最低有效位的数量来生成随机序列。该方法对激光器的工作参数不敏感，并且消除了所有外部约束的需要，例如采样率和激光器外腔往返时间不相称。长比特串的随机性已通过标准统计测试验证。
